remarks.para: The following events utilize this delegate:
Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the TextDeletedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the TextDeletedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the TextDeletedHandler is removed from the event.
